001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.poa;
002
003import com.google.common.eventbus.Subscribe;
004import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeEach;
005import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
006import org.mockito.ArgumentCaptor;
007
008import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.poa.EmailCredentialsView.EmailAddressValueListener;
009import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.poa.EmailCredentialsView.PasswordValueListener;
010import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.poa.EmailCredentialsView.SubmitCredentialsListener;
011import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
012import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.equalTo;
013import static org.mockito.Mockito.mock;
014import static org.mockito.Mockito.verify;
015
016public class EmailCredentialsPresenterTest extends EventBusTestCase {
017
018  private EmailCredentialsView view;
019  private EmailCredentialsPresenter presenter;
020
021  @Override
022  @BeforeEach
023  public void setUp() {
024    super.setUp();
025
026    this.view = mock(EmailCredentialsView.class);
027
028    presenter = new EmailCredentialsPresenter(bus, view);
029  }
030
031  @Test
032  public void downloadingSubmissionsDisplaysEmailCredentialsView() {
033    this.bus.post(new DownloadPOASubmissionsRequest());
034
035    verify(this.view).setIsVisible(true);
036  }
037
038  @Test
039  public void downloadingSubmissionsDisplaysStatusMessage() {
040    StatusMessageListener listener = mock(StatusMessageListener.class);
041    this.bus.register(listener);
042
043    this.bus.post(new DownloadPOASubmissionsRequest());
044
045    ArgumentCaptor<StatusMessage> captor = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(StatusMessage.class);
046    verify(listener).handleStatusMessage(captor.capture());
047
048    StatusMessage status = captor.getValue();
049    assertThat(status.getStatusMessage(), equalTo(EmailCredentialsPresenter.ENTER_CREDENTIALS_MESSAGE));
050  }
051
052  @Test
053  public void emailAddressInViewIsSavedToPresenter() {
054    ArgumentCaptor<EmailAddressValueListener> emailAddress = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(EmailAddressValueListener.class);
055    verify(this.view).addEmailAddressValueListener(emailAddress.capture());
056
057    String address = "me@email.com";
058    emailAddress.getValue().setEmailAddress(address);
059
060    assertThat(presenter.getEmailAddress(), equalTo(address));
061  }
062
063  @Test
064  public void passwordInViewIsSavedToPresenter() {
065    ArgumentCaptor<PasswordValueListener> passwordCaptor = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(PasswordValueListener.class);
066    verify(this.view).addPasswordValueListener(passwordCaptor.capture());
067
068    String password = "password";
069    passwordCaptor.getValue().setPassword(password);
070
071    assertThat(presenter.getPassword(), equalTo(password));
072  }
073
074  @Test
075  public void enteringCredentialsInViewFiresEmailCredentialsEvent() {
076    ArgumentCaptor<SubmitCredentialsListener> submitListener = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(SubmitCredentialsListener.class);
077    verify(this.view).addSubmitCredentialsListener(submitListener.capture());
078
079    EmailCredentialsListener listener = mock(EmailCredentialsListener.class);
080    this.bus.register(listener);
081
082    String emailAddress = "me@email.com";
083    this.presenter.setEmailAddress(emailAddress);
084    String password = "password";
085    this.presenter.setPassword(password);
086
087    submitListener.getValue().submitCredentials();
088
089    ArgumentCaptor<EmailCredentials> credentials = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(EmailCredentials.class);
090    verify(listener).emailCredentials(credentials.capture());
091
092    assertThat(credentials.getValue().getEmailAddress(), equalTo(emailAddress));
093    assertThat(credentials.getValue().getPassword(), equalTo(password));
094  }
095
096  public interface EmailCredentialsListener {
097    @Subscribe
098    void emailCredentials(EmailCredentials event);
099  }
100
101  private interface StatusMessageListener {
102    @Subscribe
103    void handleStatusMessage(StatusMessage status);
104  }
105}
